question.text: Which of the following is a correct match between crop, variety and resistance to disease?

options.text:
Crop Variety Resistance to diseases
Wheat Himgiri White rust

Crop Variety Resistance to diseases
Brassica Pusa sadabahar Black rot

Crop Variety Resistance to diseases
Cowpea Pusa komal Bacterial blight

Crop Variety Resistance to diseases
Chilli Pusa swarnim Chilly mosaic virus

solution.text: <math> <mrow> <mtable> <mtr> <mtd> <mtext mathvariant="bold">Crop</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext mathvariant="bold">Variety</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext mathvariant="bold">Resistance to diseases</mtext> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mtext>Wheat</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>Himgiri</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>Leaf and stripe rust, hill bunt</mtext> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mtext mathvariant="italic">Brassica</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>Pusa swarnim</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>White rust</mtext> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mtext>Cowpea</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>pusa komal</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>Bacterial blight</mtext> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mtext>Chilli</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>Pusa sadabahar</mtext> </mtd> <mtd> <mtext>Chilly mosaic virus</mtext> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </mrow> </math>
